title: Intercepted And Injured
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their biggest takeaways from last night’s Chiefs win over the Chargers where Justin Herbert played through injury, what impact they think the developments around the Robert Sarver case will have on the Adam SIlver and the other owners and David Pollack joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Chiefs beat the Chargers on TNF and more outrage at Robert Sarver's punishment.
